title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 381.2 - License fees for life settlement brokers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 381.2 - License fees for life settlement brokers

State Regulations
(a) The application for a license as a life settlement broker shall be made on such forms and supplements as prescribed by the superintendent and shall be accompanied by a non-refundable fee for each individual applicant and for each proposed sub-licensee of $40 for each year or fraction of a year in which a license shall be valid. (b) The application for the biennial renewal of a life settlement broker license shall be made on such forms and supplements as prescribed by the superintendent and shall be accompanied by a non-refundable fee for each individual applicant and for each proposed sub-licensee of $40 for each year or fraction of a year in which a license shall be valid. Notes

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
